column1:
#################################################
|                   Design UI                    #
|                                                 #
| Description :                                   #
|       This task involves creating wireframes    #
| and mockups for the different pages and         #
| screens of the software application.            #
| Notes :                                         #
|   This task should be completed before the      #
| code for the user interface is written, as it   #
| will provide a clear visual guide for the       #
| developers.                                     #
 ------------------------------------------------,,,

#################################################
|             authentication module              #
|                                                 #
| Description :                                   #
|       This task involves writing the code       #
| that will handle user authentication in the     #
| software application.                           #
| Notes :                                         #
|   This task should be completed before the      #
| login functionality is implemented              #
 ------------------------------------------------,,,

#################################################
|              login functionality               #
|                                                 #
| Description :                                   #
|       This task involves integrating the        #
| authentication module into the software         #
| application                                     #
| Notes :                                         #
|   This task should be completed after the       #
| code for the authentication module and the      #
| user interface have been written                #
 ------------------------------------------------,,,
